level.heading: SCOPE AND APPLICABILITY OF THE RULE (ยง 7-1807)

level.text: This chapter shall provide the rules of the classification and compensation system for staff including Retirement Board attorneys.
The Retirement Board has approved the application of this rule effective as of October 8, 2000.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 9902 (December 15, 2000).
